channel.title: Quick Question
channel.description:
For my server, i wanted to change the client background image.. to do so, i need to go into the cache folder, and replace the image, with the new one. Compress the cache, then upload it, copy the link.. and replace the cache link with the one in Client.java.. is that all i need to do, and doing that, should it still download the cache when others use it for the first time?
Im using TrisidiaX source if it matters.

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I haven’t even downloaded TrisidiaX, yet alone look at it. I would advise adding a CacheDownload class instead as well as a cache updater. But yes, that’s all you’d need to do.

Read full topic
